duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direction and supervise associates to support a sales driving culture while focusing on creating a consistent customer experience.
Engage and connect with customers by providing excellent customer service through a hospitality mentality approach.
Offer information to the customer on current merchandise assortment, store promotions and events, and execute operational processes effectively and efficiently.
Drive sales by providing an inspiring environment that motivates customers to add to their basket.
Build customer connections with a greeting and execute an authentic hospitality experience.
Leverage omni channel offerings to deliver a frictionless customer experience.
Accurately deliver on operational processes, BOPUS, BOSS, MLS, SFS.
Be a savings consultant to help customers save with a Kohl's Card.
Convert, open, and activate Kohl's Card applications.
Train associates to maximize credit and loyalty conversion performance and customer experience.
Oversee daily functions of the Cash Office (i.e. register and cash balancing, change orders, authorizing voided transactions, supplies, over/short research).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Management, or a related field
